lines.text: I do not discuss politics with women.
War is never a solution. It's an aggravation.
Why do you dislike Mr. Disraeli so much?
I neither like him nor dislike him. He's nothing to me.
You're the only man in all the world who neither likes nor dislikes Mr. Disraeli.
Behold! Winter hand in hand with spring. Innocence with...

I tell you, a ferment is at work all over the world. Titanic forces are unchained in America, forces you have no conception of. The spirit of nationality is aroused in France, in Italy, in Germany! New wine has been poured into old bottles, and an explosion must follow sooner or later. I shall not live to see it, but I hear the seething of the yeast.
She thinks you're the greatest man in the world, and she's right.
I cannot break faith with the nation.
A man who never makes jokes is a standing joke to the world.
